player.name: Shaquille O'Neal
player.physicalDescription: MASSIVE 7'1" 325-pound frame, incredibly muscular, shaved head, playful yet intimidating expression, dark skin, largest player on any court
player.archetype: The Dominant Force, unstoppable physical presence, broke backboards and spirits

figure.name: Goliath
figure.attributeDescription: enormous bronze-tipped spear the size of a weaver's beam, large bronze shield carried before him
figure.visualStyle: Philistine giant warrior, ancient Near Eastern military champion
figure.clothing: bronze scale armor coat weighing 125 pounds, bronze greaves on legs, bronze javelin slung on back, Philistine warrior helmet with plume
figure.physicalDescription: TOWERING GIANT over 9 feet tall, massively muscled warrior build, fierce bearded face, battle-scarred, olive skin, intimidating presence that struck fear into armies
figure.anatomyNote: two arms only, one holding spear
figure.archetype: The Champion Giant, undefeated warrior who terrified nations

connection.thematic: Both were physical anomalies whose sheer size and power made them seem unbeatable
connection.narrative: Two giants. One ancient battlefield. One modern court. Same energy: unstoppable force.
connection.relationship: Dominant giants who made opponents feel small

interactions.description: Two giants standing back-to-back, towering over everything
Shaq dunking while Goliath thrusts spear - parallel displays of overwhelming power
